The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's syndrome. The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with spikes with feeding tubes going into their stomachs and into their brains. They group tries to make it out of there alive only to run into kidnappers and a wild preacher.

I saw it tonight and fell asleep in the movie.

That is something that I have not done since - I have never fallen asleep at a real movie in a theater..

However, I was too tired to watch John Carter and fell asleep with approximately 20 minutes left. If I had stayed awake, I might still be at home in bed - rather than keyboarding to work.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to the original fairy tale by the brothers Grimm and the original Disney animation. I think it will be wrong to refer to this movie with any moniker whose prefix is ‘Disney’. It is as much a part of the previous franchise as ‘An Academy Award Winning Film’ is a part

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film.
